text: Apani tadera madhye yake iccha dure rakhate parena ebam yake iccha kache rakhate parena. Apani yake dure rekhechena, take kamana karale tate apanara kona dosa ne'i. Ete adhika sambhabana ache ye, tadera caksu sitala thakabe; tara duhkha pabe na ebam apani ya dena, tate tara sakale'i santusta thakabe. Tomadera antare ya ache, allaha janena. Allaha sarbajna, sahanasila.
